mapper.select: select c.cheerNo, c.projectNo, c.id, c.cheerContent, c.cheerRegdate, c.cheerNotify, c.cheerParentNo, m.picture from tb_cheer c join tb_member m on c.id = m.id where projectNo = #{_parameter} start with cheerParentNo is null connect by prior cheerNo = cheerParentNo
mapper.delete: delete from tb_cheer where id=#{id} and cheerNo=#{cheerNo} or cheerParentNo =#{cheerNo}
